scripts.build-linux: pkg dist/index.js -t node12-linux-x64 -o ./bin/linux/gitlab-runner-local && tar -czvf bin/linux.gz bin/linux/
scripts.build-macos: pkg dist/index.js -t node12-macos-x64 -o ./bin/macos/gitlab-runner-local && tar -czvf bin/macos.gz bin/macos/
scripts.build-win: pkg dist/index.js -t node12-win-x64 -o ./bin/win/gitlab-runner-local && tar -czvf bin/win.gz bin/win/
scripts.build-all: npm run build-linux && npm run build-macos && npm run build-win
